data.message:
hi facebook . i have a big problem . someone is posting that is annoying, and bullying me. i need help for that account to be deactivated. a badly needed this because i'am involve in her posts.
this is the link, https://www.facebook.com/jhomarlopez04

replies.message: Hi Krystal. We're sorry to hear that! Facebook offers tools to help you deal with bullying and harassment. Head to our Help Center to learn more about these tools: http://on.fb.me/N6BWJ5  -Ryan
ive read it already and all i want is her account to be deactivated . i think and this is proven that, that account was made to bully me. she is caughting too much attentions of my friends.
i blocked the account already. and she start to posts on my friends wall or status which is all about me that wasnt true. this girl is really up to something. i hope this page can help me.
just because of my looks? LOL . so you've browsed my photos already
